channel.title: Paying For Help!
channel.description:
[size=18pt][/size]Hello, RsPsVeTeRaN here to ask for Help. I am useing a [Pi] source and BTW I am paying By Paypal. I will list the things i need help with below. If you are interested add me on skype, my username is - RsPsVeTeRaN or if you don`t have skype, just private message me and we will work something out.[/size]
[size=24pt][b]Here is What I need Help With.[/b][/size]
[size=14pt]1. [/size]Different look in the teleports when you click them.
[size=14pt]2. [/size]Some of the Armour goes through Ur body when equipped.
[size=14pt]3. [/size]On the webclient, when you start an account, it says you have all 99`s when you really don`t.
[size=14pt]4. [/size]Player following, npc, clipping. So i want full clipping.
[size=14pt]5. [/size]When you right click someones name when they type, and you hit add friend, it doesn`t add, you have to type there name the add them.
[size=14pt]6. [/size]The note tab doesn`t work at all, so it just takes space. Want it removed or fix.
[size=14pt]7. [/size]Vote point shop, and a way for when they do ::vote, they can do ::claim to get voting points.
[size=14pt]8. [/size]Full Working Godwars and Castle Wars.
[size=14pt]9. [/size]This is kinda just an extra question, i am also experimenting with the Phoenix-Pkz source and client. But it will not connect? So if you could help with this to, it would be great!
[size=24pt][b]Please post add me on skype - RsPsVeTeRaN or post a reply, or just private message me![/b][/size]

item.title: Paying For Help!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You can’t buy/sell/offer compensation on these forums.

We are also not a spoonfeeding community.

Read full topic

item.title: Paying For Help!
item.dc:creator: @Demo1 Demo_
item.description:
@Demo1 wrote:

Why don’t you look in the tutorials section and do it yourself?

Read full topic

item.title: Paying For Help!
item.dc:creator: @RsPsVeTeRaN RsPsVeTeRaN
item.description:
@RsPsVeTeRaN wrote:

[size=18pt][/size]Hello, RsPsVeTeRaN here to ask for Help. I am useing a [Pi] source and BTW I am paying By Paypal. I will list the things i need help with below. If you are interested add me on skype, my username is - RsPsVeTeRaN or if you don`t have skype, just private message me and we will work something out.[/size]

[size=24pt]Here is What I need Help With.[/size]

[size=14pt]1. [/size]Different look in the teleports when you click them.

[size=14pt]2. [/size]Some of the Armour goes through Ur body when equipped.

[size=14pt]3. [/size]On the webclient, when you start an account, it says you have all 99s when you really dont.

[size=14pt]4. [/size]Player following, npc, clipping. So i want full clipping.

[size=14pt]5. [/size]When you right click someones name when they type, and you hit add friend, it doesn`t add, you have to type there name the add them.

[size=14pt]6. [/size]The note tab doesn`t work at all, so it just takes space. Want it removed or fix.

[size=14pt]7. [/size]Vote point shop, and a way for when they do ::vote, they can do ::claim to get voting points.

[size=14pt]8. [/size]Full Working Godwars and Castle Wars.

[size=14pt]9. [/size]This is kinda just an extra question, i am also experimenting with the Phoenix-Pkz source and client. But it will not connect? So if you could help with this to, it would be great!

[size=24pt]Please post add me on skype - RsPsVeTeRaN or post a reply, or just private message me![/size]

Read full topic
